title: Part 1: Dawn of the Modern Age of Genetics
description: Science and personal stories come together to reveal the history of the human genome; patients with rare genetic diseases and their doctors race against time to discover cures.

title: Part 2: Revolution in the Treatment of Disease
description: Geneticists wrestle with moral implications of new technologies that offer both promise and point a young scientist with spinal muscular atrophy reaches a treatment for her condition.
